vote.title: To repeal and replace A0077-2021, and to appoint Janet Jackson, 2865 Castlewood Road, Columbus, Ohio 43209, to serve as Chairperson of the Civilian Police Review Board, with a term expiration date of April 30, 2023 (resume attached).

To repeal and replace A0077-2021, and to appoint Janet Jackson, 2865 Castlewood Road, Columbus, Ohio 43209, to serve as Chairperson of the Civilian Police Review Board, with a term expiration date of April 30, 2023 (resume attached).
